titleStmt.title: Designing a Deck of Timeline Cards for Tabletops and Tabletop Simulator
titleStmt.author: Mita Williams

sourceDesc.p: Born digital, in a markdown format. This lesson is original.

abstract.p: This lesson demonstrates how to use nanDECK to design and publish your own deck of printed or digital playing cards, and use them to test a group's knowledge of historical events through a _Timeline_-like game mechanic. This lesson will also highlight best practices for handling digitized historical objects.
